extendedInfo.description: Subscribing AutoCheck business customers can now access AutoCheck vehicle history reports from their mobile device. After downloading and launching the application, log in using your existing Customer ID and Password to enter a VIN to request a report, review your vehicle report history and email customer service. This application contains AutoCheck's complete Glossary of terms and FAQ.Features Include:- Scan VIN Barcodes- VIN Search functionality- Immediate access to AutoCheck Vehicle History Reports- Search History storage for future review**Only available to active AutoCheck Business subscribersBy Experian Information Solutions, Inc.

reviews.title: Autofocus
reviews.comment: Can seem to access autofocus on Samsung S4?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok but has issues
reviews.comment: The problem is that AutoCheck uses some awful and over complicated way to scan barcodes. So to the developers look into Zxing its open source, its free and it works with more phones (even the iPhone and iPad) also it will survive new Android versions unlike what ever your using. I am very disappointed in this app and we should expect better from a company of this size.
reviews.author: eric messenger

reviews.comment: Good when it works. Barcode will not scan and now it will not let me scroll  to see the  full report...please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Auto check
reviews.comment: Great app . perfect for car dealers to check for problems.   Keep up the good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scam!!!
reviews.comment: Paid $45 for unlimited account . Than couldn\'t use the aplication .when called for help they cancell the account without refund saying that i ran to many reports previously with my other account. Great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: There are two different apps available
reviews.comment: One is for dealers. One is for consumers. Make sure to get the right one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I used in cars I knew. Very well, it give me all false information in 8 out of 10 cars. good for us , bad for regular customers at the end they would
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work for consumer accounts, which is weak. Wish I knew this before paying the $45 for 30-day account.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seemless... But where is export/email/print??
reviews.comment: This app is slick, simple and straightforward, displaying vehicle reports quickly without fuss. However, there is NO way to export, email or print the file. This is quite a let down. How can I send customers reports from my device? Please integrate this functionality, and this will be five stars all the way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: DO NOT DOWNLOAD I would give it zero stars, but for the fact I paid fifty bucks and have no Mobile support.... those jerks owe me like 45 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great, need to add email option availability to dealer subscribers. James D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only for dealers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NO HELP FOR THE CONSUMER !!!!!! AutoCheck has forgot why they are in business. Let me remind you people. It is to help the consumer first. I will be cruising the local used car lots this weekend and would have loved to use this APP on my phone to help with my decision, but they only allow DEALERS to use this APP. HELLO! These are the SHARKS trying to push SALVAGE or 10 Owner Vehicles on us. I paid $50 bucks for nothing. I am not going VIN# shopping. I am going Car Shopping. AutoCheck Please Fix This ASAP! Let both parties enjoy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very happy with the app. I have been using it for a couple months now and it is my favorite auction tool! Moto Droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is awesome! Makes me glad i choose autocheck over carfax when deciding which service to purchase for our dealership.

reviews.comment: Only for business users, which totally sucks for us \"regular\" customers that already paid a $50 subscription. Lame!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am a paying customer and yet I can\'t have access to this app? This is bs. This app should be for consumers not just business members.

reviews.comment: AWESOME JUST AS DESCRIBED.

reviews.comment: You people are idiots. This is a service similar to Car Fax, and is intended for dealers shopping auctions. 5 stars.
